title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 21 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 21 2022
description:
Art Laffer, former Reagan economic advisor, joins Clay and Buck to discuss the Biden recession, the jobs market and the way out of Bidenflation. Modern monetary theory doesn't work. "Armed bystander" is how regime propaganda outlet, CNN, refers to Indiana mall hero. Starbucks CEO says they are closing stores due to crime concerns, blames elected officials for "abdication" on crime, homelessness killing businesses. Democrat-run cities continue to lose business.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
